There is a discussion about the usefulness of the `axes_grid1` interface in the repository, with some users suggesting that it is superseded by features of modern matplotlib. There is also a concern about the lack of development in the shared colorbar handling. Some users have provided alternative solutions using `plt.subplots()`, but there are still issues with the colorbar being associated with only one image. There is a suggestion to get rid of `axes_grid1` and improve the main library instead. Additionally, there is a reported issue with the `ngrids` parameter in the `Grid` class.
